definition: to ferment/to brew/to make honey (of bees)/to lead to/to form gradually/wine/stuffed vegetables (cooking method)
10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
(of alcohol) to ferment/(of a crisis) to be brewing/to mull over (an issue)/to hold exploratory discussions
to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
zymase (enzyme in yeast involved in fermentation)

sentences.english: Oh, one more thing, I've ordered another dish, stuffed pork chop. Can it be served sooner?
sentences.chinese: 对了，我还点了一个酿猪扒，能否快些上来？

sentences.english: Well, it takes a lot of pails of sap to make one pail of syrup.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，需要很多桶的糖树汁才能酿一桶枫蜜。

sentences.english: Bee stuffed sweet flowers, group of people reading the book out the truth.
sentences.chinese: 蜂采百花酿甜蜜，人读群书明真理。

sentences.english: Making bamboo beer requires a process of fermenting the rich natural sugars of the plant’s sap.
sentences.chinese: 酿竹子酒需要将竹子汁液中富含的天然糖分发酵。

sentences.english: My favorite is the taro stem and duck.
sentences.chinese: 而我最喜欢的就是秘制芋头茎酿鸭肉。

sentences.english: The men spend their leisure time drinking the local brew.
sentences.chinese: 男人们喝着当地酿的酒消磨时间。

sentences.english: A passing planet is the cause of disaster, and there will be no escape for mankind.
sentences.chinese: 一颗过境的行星是酿灾难的首恶，类无处可逃。

sentences.english: Dow's Fine Tawny is a three year old blend, light in style.
sentences.chinese: 多斯优质茶色波特酒为三年酿混合酒，风格轻盈。

sentences.english: Another West Lake specialty took center stage next when the guests were served roe crab meat stuffed in orange.
sentences.chinese: 另一个上桌的西湖特色菜是膏蟹酿香橙。

sentences.english: And a wine that ferments and matures in oak is called barrel fermented .
sentences.chinese: 而在橡木桶发酵并存放的酒叫桶酿。

sentences.english: 1 bee stuffed sweet flowers, group of people reading the book out the truth.
sentences.chinese: 蜂采百花酿甜蜜，人读群书明真理。

sentences.english: Grandmother's homemade wine was made from plums.
sentences.chinese: 祖母自制的酒是用梅子酿的。

sentences.english: Beaujolais Villages is very versatile with all kinds of food, even spicy.
sentences.chinese: 博若莱村酿适于搭配任何食物，甚至是辣味菜肴。
白兰地酒是用葡萄酿的。

sentences.english: The reason it becomes a kind of quality wine lies much in the water it uses.
sentences.chinese: 绍兴黄酒所以成为隹酿，与所用的水关系很大。

definition: to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
name of a famous Tang dynasty wine/same as 白酒[bai2 jiu3]
to blend various types of wine (or spirits, or fruit juices etc)
"yellow wine" (mulled rice wine, usually served warm)
jug (earthenware with a big belly and a small opening)
